content: #BlackinChemRollCall I’m a postdoc at @NUChemistry in the @CHADNANO lab using DNA to organize proteins. Other interests include making polymers. #BlackInChem is so important for kids like me that grew up in predominately white towns w/o strong black role models. Keep amplifying!
